requestBody.description: The attributes and relationships of the country to create.

201.description: The country was successfully created, which resulted in additional changes. The newly created country is returned.

Location.description: The URL at which the newly created country can be retrieved.

204.description: The country was successfully created, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The query string is invalid or the request body is missing or malformed.

403.description: Client-generated IDs cannot be used at this endpoint.

404.description: A related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

post.summary: Adds existing languages to the languages relationship of an individual country.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the country to add languages to.

requestBody.description: The identities of the languages to add to the languages relationship.

204.description: The languages were successfully added, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The country or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

patch.summary: Assigns existing languages to the languages relationship of an individual country.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the country whose languages relationship to assign.

requestBody.description: The identities of the languages to assign to the languages relationship, or an empty array to clear the relationship.

204.description: The languages relationship was successfully updated, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The country or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.

delete.summary: Removes existing languages from the languages relationship of an individual country.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The identifier of the country to remove languages from.

requestBody.description: The identities of the languages to remove from the languages relationship.

204.description: The languages were successfully removed, which did not result in additional changes.

400.description: The request body is missing or malformed.

404.description: The country or a related resource does not exist.

409.description: The request body contains conflicting information or another resource with the same ID already exists.

422.description: Validation of the request body failed.
